# MLU

## Exp. 1A

```{r}
ggscatter(experiment_1A, x = "MLU_Morphemes", y = "entropy", 
          add = "reg.line", conf.int = TRUE, 
          cor.coef = TRUE, cor.method = "spearman",
          xlab = "MLU in morphemes", ylab = "Entropy (Exp. 1A)")
```
